submissions.name: puppeteer-http-server
submissions.author: Neon
submissions.description: This will auto attach a page to each puppeteer request via expressjs. can be useful with express API's

submissions.name: Book-Scraper
submissions.author: Aarav J
submissions.description: Book-Scraper is a tool that allows you to capture and save screenshots of online books, even if they are not directly downloadable. The tool automates the process of taking screenshots of each page, saving them as image files, and then combines these images into a single PDF. It is useful for converting web-based books into a portable format for offline reading or archiving.

submissions.name: swatch_time
submissions.author: Neko
submissions.description: swatch_time is a JS library to convert ISO-8601 timestamps to Swatch .beat Internet Time, an attempt by Swatch to create a decimalized time system that gained a bit of popularity in the 2000s with it's usage in places like Phantasy Star Online.

submissions.name: former
submissions.author: DJ_Laser
submissions.description: Its a generic form tool aimed at cli but gereric enough for any purpose

submissions.name: console.style
submissions.author: Anicetus
submissions.description: console.style is a simple and easy tool for developers to use to color and style their console.log outputs! With easy bolding, italicizing, coloring, and more, this versatile and simple NPM package will make console logging fun and easy.

submissions.name: envario
submissions.author: frèrot
submissions.description: envario is tool that helps to Validate and load .env files with type-safe checks.

submissions.name: tpov_extract_visu
submissions.author: Cyril Li
submissions.description: tpov_extract_visu is a tool to visualize JSON files created by tpov_extract (part of the tpov project) on a map. Individual objects representing stops and route shape can be viewed by clicking them on the map.

submissions.name: betamax-timestamp
submissions.author: TwigCoder
submissions.description: This library converts modern digital timestamps (HH:MM:SS) to Betamax counter numbers and vice versa. It is perfect for archivists, museums, and any tech enthusiasts working with digitized Betamax tapes.

submissions.name: memo-wrap
submissions.author: Podter
submissions.description: Cache the result of function calls. Simply wrap your async function with memo and the return result will be cached. Inspired from Next.js's unstable_cache function and unstorage's modular design.

submissions.name: proconsole
submissions.author: giacomo
submissions.description: ProConsole is an npm library for creating colored messages in the console. It allows you to define dynamic methods to print messages with specific colors, improving the readability and organization of logs.

submissions.name: tsrt
submissions.author: Monke
submissions.description: tsrt is a CLI tool coded in Typescript that allows users to easily sort files or manual input via the terminal based on both lexicographical and numerical order. No fuzz, no weird settings, no configuration. For more advanced users, an optional option for a specific algorithm is able to be specified. The selection of 7 algorithms can also be benchmarked with variable test sizes using -b.

submissions.name: Get Start Hackin'
submissions.author: Avinash
submissions.description: This is a tool which helps the developer generate boilerplate code for when they start a new project. Think of it as create-next-app but for multiple type of projects from python to native HTML,CSS AND JS. Its a one step solution for that. Also I have added some commands so that even the frameworks like nextjs and react they are better!

submissions.name: createsudokupuzzle
submissions.author: dave9123
submissions.description: Generate and solve sudoku puzzles easily!

submissions.name: misobox
submissions.author: spacefall
submissions.description: misobox is a CLI tool that captures and saves error messages or notes added manually from your projects for later review.

submissions.name: plugdb
submissions.author: samannoyb
submissions.description: An effective yet mini and handy tool of a database system that allows to quickly save and store data and retrieve/modify it from a json file. Saves time, saves code.

submissions.name: fahs
submissions.author: Arti
submissions.description: Fahs is a tool to inspect variables and log to console, as an alternative to a bland console.log

submissions.name: Fen2board
submissions.author: Souptik Samanta
submissions.description: Uses FEN (Forsyth–Edwards Notation) strings. It allows me to input chess positions in FEN format, visualize them in a text-based board representation in the console, make moves using algebraic notation (e.g., 'd2d4'), and track game state including whose turn it is, castling rights, en passant possibilities, and move counters.

submissions.name: password-checker
submissions.author: Ethan
submissions.description: It checks if the password fits the requirements (min and max length, num of numbers and num of special charecters).

submissions.name: b2-uploader
submissions.author: Deployor
submissions.description: Turn any URL into cloud storage with a single command! The ultimate CLI toolkit that makes Backblaze B2 storage management a breeze - from instant URL uploads to encrypted batch processing, all from your terminal. Including an easy to use wizzard!

submissions.name: path-convert
submissions.author: Hash-AK
submissions.description: Path-Convert-JS is a simple tool that permit to easily transform path, from DOS to Unix-style, Unix to DOS-style, and DOS to DOS escaped

submissions.name: cnrt
submissions.author: Monke
submissions.description: cnrt is a CLI for converting various units including length, light, mass, temperature, time, and volume such as kilometers to miles, pounds to grams, and more. And it's all written in TypeScript! You can find the package on npm.

submissions.name: tace
submissions.author: HydrogenMacro
submissions.description: TACE allows you to create reusable components in the form of custom elements easily and directly in your HTML file.

submissions.name: atb-resistor-calculator
submissions.author: Santorini
submissions.description: atb-resistor-calculator is a tool that helps you find resistor values by just typing the color bands, or you can type the values to find out which color band resistor you need.

submissions.name: Nest-Mail
submissions.author: Oliver
submissions.description: Nest Mail is an NPM package that allows you to send simple emails through Hack Club's Nest mail server.

submissions.name: UnitEase
submissions.author: Irtaza
submissions.description: A lightweight JavaScript library for unit conversions, supporting custom conversions and factors, along with length, weight, temperature, time and aliasing

submissions.name: vite-plugin-emit-qr
submissions.author: Mish
submissions.description: This is a Vite plugin that takes the built index.html file, encodes it as a data: URI, and emits a QR code image file that contains that data. In other words, your whole web app can be encoded as a QR code! This will be especially useful if creating a #saycheese submission :)

submissions.name: chroma
submissions.author: Emma
submissions.description: Simple color picker for the web. Initialize Chroma on a HTML field and let it do it's magic.

submissions.name: Readme Scaffolder
submissions.author: Hridya Agrawal
submissions.description: Scaffold your project readme to have a basic readme for your project without having to worry about it later or save time with basic stuff taken care of!
